remarks: The ` bits ` function restricted to nonnegative integers is a bijection from the integers to the finite sets of integers.  It is in fact the inverse of the Ackermann bijection ~ ackbijnn .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2016.)

bitsf1ocnv $p |- ( ( bits |` NN0 ) : NN0 -1-1-onto-> ( ~P NN0 i^i Fin ) /\ `' ( bits |` NN0 ) = ( x e. ( ~P NN0 i^i Fin ) |-> sum_ n e. x ( 2 ^ n ) ) ) $.
$d n x $.
